mapper.select: SELECT count(1) from XT_QJJL where ssid = #{ssid} and zt='8'

select qj.*, dm.dmmc as sjmc from XT_QJJL qj left join XT_GYDM dm on dm.id = qj.sjid and dm.lbid = '5' where qj.zt = '8' and qj.ssid = #{ssid} and qj.zb != '' order by qj.xgsj desc limit ${startPage}, ${page}
SELECT count(1) from XT_QJJL where ssid = #{ssid} and zt in ('1','3') and zb != ''

select qj.*, dm.dmmc as sjmc from XT_QJJL qj left join XT_GYDM dm on dm.id = qj.sjid and dm.lbid = '5' where qj.zt in ('1','3') and qj.ssid = #{ssid} and qj.zb != '' order by qj.xgsj desc limit ${startPage}, ${page}

select qj.*, group_concat(jl.zt separator '|') as jjyzt from XT_QJJL qj left join XT_SSJL jl on qj.id = jl.qjid and jl.zt in ('0','1','3') where qj.zt in ('1','3') and qj.ssid = #{ssid} and qj.zb != '' group by qj.id

select qj.*, dm.dmmc as sjmc,ry.xm as jjyxm,ry.dh as jjydh,jl.bhms as bhms,jl.clms as clms, jl.zt as jjyzt from XT_QJJL qj left join XT_SSJL jl on qj.id = jl.qjid and jl.zt in ('0','1','2','3') left join XT_JJRY ry on jl.ryid = ry.id and ry.zt = '1' left join XT_GYDM dm on dm.id = qj.sjid and dm.lbid = '5' where qj.id = #{qjid}
